#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
       int count[1000005],P,i,N;
       scanf("%d",&N);
       for(i=0;i<1000005;i++)
       {
            count[i]=0;
       }
       long long int totalpairs=0;
       for(i=0;i<N;i++)
       {
             scanf("%d",&P);
             totalpairs+=i-count[P];
             ++count[P];
       }
       printf("%lld\n",totalpairs);
       return 0;
}
